com.automatak.dnp3

Interface ListenableFuture<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The return type of the operation.

    public interface ListenableFuture<T>
    Represents the future result of asynchronous operation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ListenableFuture.CompletionListener<T>
      A 'callback' that is registered via addListener and invoked when the operation completes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(ListenableFuture.CompletionListener<T> listener)
      Adds a callback that is invoked when the asynchronous operation completes.
      T get()
      Blocks until the asynchronous operation completes

    • Method Detail

      • get

        T get()
      throws InterruptedException
        Blocks until the asynchronous operation completes
        Returns:
        The result of the operation
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • addListener

        void addListener(ListenableFuture.CompletionListener<T> listener)
        Adds a callback that is invoked when the asynchronous operation completes. If the operation is already complete, the callback is invoked from the calling thread.
        Parameters:
        listener - Callback object invoked when the operation completes
